text: @ifenyinwa_ Not necessarily.  No one's been able to explore inside the earth, it is hot and molten, we only know a little about it from volcanic eruptions and earthquakes.  So who knows what's really inside.

@m_spiceo @hankgreen But over millions of years, new layers of sediment erode and move across the earth’s surface. You get things like volcanic eruptions and earthquakes and tsunamis moving everything around over time. But we do still have water-filled sinkholes from it (pink dots) https://t.co/vRwuFYX9fT

The large, dark areas on the Moon's surface - 'mare' - are solidified lava beds from ancient volcanic eruptions. Early astronomers also gave other lunar features names for lakes (lacus), marshes (palus), bays (sinus) and one ocean (oceanus). 
#astronomy #Moon https://t.co/2IX5Wb9OoM

@Hohheli @twilamoon @arctic_today @m_scribe @YJRosen It is not a question of denying that there are climatic variations, up or down, but to believe that it is humans who are responsible for them is really delusional. Like to believe that we could have an influence on tides or volcanic eruptions.
@Michael77756249 @twilamoon @ClimateOfGavin @arctic_today @m_scribe @YJRosen Let nature do what she has to do. We have no control over the climate, nor over tides and volcanic eruptions. Wake up !

@BillyPhysics @emeryemeryii @pastorlocke Actually, no, tectonic activity hasn’t been causing earthquakes and volcanic eruptions for hundreds of millions of years, but instead it has been causing earthquakes and volcanic eruptions for a few thousands of years. Agree to disagree here.

@jckrempasky @emeryemeryii @pastorlocke "tectonic activity didn’t start fully happening until the global flood occur" - there is absolutely no evidence of that. Quite the opposite. Tectonic activity has been causing earthquakes and volcanic eruptions for hundreds of millions of years.

Volcanic Explosivity Index (VEI) is a relative scale that enables explosive volcanic eruptions to be compared with one another. The volume of products, eruption cloud height, and qualitative observations are used to determine the explosive value. 
#GSI #GeoJargons https://t.co/2MlD0wrB3Y
